test.fill_query: insert into function file('test_orc_tfp.orc', 'ORC') select * from generateRandom('int64_column Nullable(Int64), tuple_column Tuple(a Nullable(String), b Nullable(Float64), c Nullable(Int64)), array_tuple_column Array(Tuple(a Nullable(String), b Nullable(Float64), c Nullable(Int64))), map_tuple_column Map(String, Tuple(a Nullable(String), b Nullable(Float64), c Nullable(Int64)))') limit 1000000
test.query: select * from file('test_orc_tfp.orc', 'ORC', 'int64_column Int64, tuple_column Tuple(c Nullable(Int64))') format Null
select * from file('test_orc_tfp.orc', 'ORC', 'int64_column Int64, array_tuple_column Array(Tuple(c Nullable(Int64)))') format Null
